About this course::

With the latest major release of RSpec, testing in Ruby has become even more powerful. New matchers, a better API and more power to the user through configuration are just some of the features in version 3. Join Ruby expert JosÃƒÂ© Mota and improve the way you test your Ruby code with RSpec.
